Name: Battle Imagine - Lizardman Mage
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Lizardman Mage's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Water of Silence.

Stunt! Water of Silence
Summon Elite: Lizardman Mage and conjures Water of Silence at the target's feet, dealing Magic Damage and slowing down the target.
Upon the skill cast, your Ice Bonus is increased for a period.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
